nodes.text: Clone Wars Miniatures Preview 3 is a web supplement by Wizards of the Coast. It previews figures from the Star Wars Miniatures: The Clone Wars set from the Star Wars Miniatures line, as well as containing supplementary information for the Star Wars Saga Edition Roleplaying Game which coincides with the release of the The Clone Wars Campaign Guide. The supplement was written by Sterling Hershey. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website and is the third of five in the series of "Clone Wars Miniatures Preview" web enhancements. This article covers the "Trandoshan Scavenger" and the "Quarren Isolationist". The Trandoshan Scavenger was armed with a vibrosword while the Quarren Isolationist wielded a trident.
